content.text:
# List of amphibious warfare ships of the Royal Navy

This is a list of amphibious warfare ships of the Royal Navy of the United Kingdom.
Active ships
*  Landing platform dock (LPD)
**Albion – extended readiness (uncrewed reserve; to be retired by March 2025)
**Bulwark – extended readiness (available for reactivation if required; to be retired by March 2025)
Decommissioned
Ocean class
